results.title: Trump Keeps His Conservative Movement Allies Closest

results.title: West Virginia Governor to Switch from Democrat to Republican
results.abstract: With President Trump by his side, West Virginia’s newly elected Democratic governor, Jim Justice, will announce Thursday night that he is becoming a Republican.
results.byline: By JONATHAN MARTIN and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

multimedia.caption: Gov. Jim Justice of West Virginia in January. Mr. Justice, a coal and real estate magnate, ran as a conservative Democrat and declined to endorse Hillary Clinton in 2016.

results.title: Linking Public Works to Local Hiring Faces a Trump Challenge
